mapper.select: SELECT psno, title, userid, discount, type, target, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wine.wno = target) ELSE NULL END as namekor, (SELECT nickname FROM member WHERE promotion_sale.userid=member.id) as nickname FROM promotion_sale WHERE enddate>sysdate AND state=0 AND userid LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
